summary: Ego vehicle is driving on a road with shops on both sides. A parked car has its trunk open and people are standing near it. A scooter appears from behind the parked car.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. People are standing near a parked car. A scooter is moving from right to left.
characters: People near the parked car, scooter rider.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, parked car, scooter, pedestrians, buildings.
